about_the_game:
DUEL TO THE HOLES is the ultimate parody you didn’t know you needed—a bold, over-the-top visual novel packed with action, insane anime moments, and shamelessly wild futa battles. This game takes all the epic intensity and cranks it up to levels you won’t believe!

WHOA, WHOA, WHOA! What is this madness?! It’s the wildest, most hardcore futa adventure you’ve ever seen! Prepare for duels so outrageous they’ll leave you speechless. We’re talking jaw-dropping power-ups, gravity-defying moves, and absurdly massive... weapons.

In a world where strength and lust collide, the most badass fighters are dueling not just for victory, but for total domination in the most outlandish, NSFW ways imaginable! Enter our heroines—larger-than-life futas with attitude and “skills” to match. Whether it’s an epic showdown or a ridiculous challenge, DUEL TO THE HOLES will pull you deep into its universe of outrageous battles and jaw-dropping encounters.

As the duels intensify, so does the absurdity, pushing the limits of what's possible. Each battle escalates with wild new twists, where nothing is off the table and everything is unexpected.

  • Epic Moments: Explosive battles, intense showdowns, and dramatic power-ups straight out of your favorite anime.

  • Bold Futa Action: Prepare for some of the most daring, shameless, and wildly creative futa encounters you’ve ever seen.

  • Outrageous Humor: Dumb jokes, ridiculous situations, and over-the-top moments that will keep you entertained.

  • High-Energy Visuals: Stunning HD renders that make every moment more intense and immersive.

  • One-Hand Playability: Whether it's for gameplay or giggles, you'll have a free hand at all times.

It’s fast, it’s wild, it’s outrageous—DUEL TO THE HOLES is the anime-style futa experience you didn’t know you needed but can’t live without. Ready for the craziest showdown of your life?

content_descriptors.notes:
This game is intended for adults only and contains explicit content that may be disturbing to some audiences. All characters depicted are over the age of 18.

The game features the following mature content:
-Sexual acts, including consensual and non-consensual (sexual assault) scenarios.
-Themes involving BDSM and power dynamics.
-Transgender sexual content, including futanari characters.

The game does not include:
-Drug or alcohol abuse.
-Self-harm or suicide.
Players are advised to approach with caution, as the game explores intense sexual themes that may not be suitable for all viewers.

The developer holds full and exclusive rights to commercially utilize the aforementioned artworks provided by the artist, within the context of creating and distributing this game.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Steam OS or Ubuntu 16.04
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4700
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Version 10.11+
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4700
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Duel to The Holes

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4700
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Welcome to The Hole, where the only thing bigger than the trouble is... well, let's just say the locals have a few extra tricks up their sleeves - and their pants.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Turkish, Japanese
